      • evaluateQuery

        public static java.lang.String evaluateQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                             Document dataDoc)
                                      throws net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException
        Evaluates an XQuery against a data document
        Parameters:
        query - the XQuery to evaluate
        dataDoc - a JDOM Document containing the data tree
        Returns:
        an XML String representing the result of the evaluation
        Throws:
        net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException - if there's a problem with the XQuery or Document

      • evaluateListQuery

        public static java.util.List<Content> evaluateListQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                        Element dataElem)
                                                 throws net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException
        Evaluates an XQuery against a data document
        Parameters:
        query - the XQuery to evaluate
        dataElem - a JDOM Element containing the data tree
        Returns:
        a List containing the Element(s) resulting from the evaluation
        Throws:
        net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException - if there's a problem with the XQuery or Element
